subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|刀|口|c1=p|c2=s|t2=mouth|ls=psc}} – to call out (with one’s mouth).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[imperial]] [[decree]]
# to [[call]] [[together]]; to [[convene]]; to [[summon]]
# [[temple]] or [[monastery]] (used in [[placename]]s in [[Inner Mongolia]])
